title: Definitions
context: [ยง480F-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context requires otherwise: &ldquo;Check&rdquo; means any check, draft, money order, or other instrument for the transmission or payment of money. &ldquo;Check&rdquo; does not include a traveler&rsquo;s check or foreign denomination or foreign drawn payment instrument. &ldquo;Check casher&rdquo; means a person or entity that engages in the business of cashing checks for a fee. &ldquo;Deferred deposit&rdquo; means a transaction in which a check casher refrains from depositing a personal check written by a customer until a date after the transaction date, pursuant to a written agreement. &ldquo;Fee&rdquo; includes any payment of cash or other consideration paid or given by a customer to a check casher in exchange for the cashing of a check, including an exchange of value for the purchase of catalog items, which is in excess of regular retail value, or for coupons, which may be redeemed for goods or services. [L 1999, c 146, pt of ยง1; am L 2001, c 20, ยง1]
